channel.title: BoneScape 508 Source - Pking/Spawning Server - Updated
channel.description:
[center][font=arial black][size=36pt]BoneScape[/size][/font][/center]
Someone has leeched my source on google because about a year ago google got reset and I had quit rsps. His name is pure-skillz and I just noticed he has leeched it. My name on Run3-locus is frogs482 anybody else posting this source is a fake, thanks
Hello, Welcome to my source. I decided to release my source because lots of people already have it, and I am worried someone else might release it. Also, my server might have to go down forever. :( This source is good for beginners, but not for leechers. If you are a leecher, please leave. :) I will remove the source if I see that people are leeching it.
-My Run3-Locus name is Frogs482. My Run3--s3rv3r name is Frogs482.-
Server is a 508 Spawning/Pking server. You need money to spawn items. Pk in several different combat zones, including Bounty Hunter, Ardougne, Varrock, and Camelot. Since my client is not editable, I recommend having your players use an IP Changer for now. I worked hard on this source and it was my very first server I ever coded. I did all the coding, no help except for on client from my friend Ethan and from the source that I used. I might have accidentally uploaded the wrong source here if I did I will find the right one.
.::Features::.
-Fixed dupes I found -Added turmoil ( Chivalry ) -Bounty Hunter 90% (100% High Level Crater) -Perfected PvP -Spawn -Killcosts for items like Fire Cape, Torso. -Unlock requirements for items like RFD Gloves, Defenders. -Added tons of commands -Start out with 50m Spend XP and 100m Cash to spawn with + ::Starter -Added an effect for your RunServer.bat that lets you see who logs in and has a live chatlog. -Added Vesta/Morrigan/Zuriel/Statius Bonuses and killcosts -All Godswords 100% -Spirit Shields (With perfect 3D Models) -Added Dragon Claws Killcost -Was working on getting correct GFX for D Claws, but my computer is unable to host now. -100% Vengeance and Veng Other -Cannot aid someone who is fighting -Clan Chat -Got a different compiler -Alot more I can't remember..
.::Commands::.
-Player- ::pvp ::ardy ::cammy ::edge ::normaledge ::mb ::eastdragons ::cw ::item (ID) (amount) - It costs money ::starter ::players ::rules ::commands ::bh ::kdratio ::networth ::checkkills ::checkprice ::lvl (lvlid) (xp) ::reset (lvlid) - Costs 10m ::hair ::clothes ::shoes ::male ::female
-There is alot more I can't remember on here too.
-Donator- (All Player Commands) "/" (Text) - Serves as a ::yell command.
-Mod- (All Player Commands) (All Donator Commands) ::muteuser ::unmuteuser
-Admin- (All Player Commands) (All Donator Commands) (All Mod Commands) ::noclip ::ipbanuser ::banuser
-There are a few more I can't remember
.::Pictures::.
[URL=http://img84.imageshack.us/i/thewall.png/][IMG]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/9924/thewall.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
PvP Loots [URL=http://img693.imageshack.us/i/pvploots.png/][IMG]http://img693.imageshack.us/img693/3063/pvploots.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
Pits [URL=http://img375.imageshack.us/i/pits.png/][IMG]http://img375.imageshack.us/img375/5163/pits.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://img443.imageshack.us/i/pjerteam.png/][IMG]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/1145/pjerteam.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://img441.imageshack.us/i/constantpking.png/][IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/8277/constantpking.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://img442.imageshack.us/i/bshomemadebanner.png/][IMG]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/7033/bshomemadebanner.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
[URL=http://img69.imageshack.us/i/weaponsbs.png/][IMG]http://img69.imageshack.us/img69/9136/weaponsbs.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
.::Virus Scan::.
[URL=http://img337.imageshack.us/i/bonescapevirusscan.png/][IMG]http://img337.imageshack.us/img337/2302/bonescapevirusscan.png[/img][/URL]
Uploaded with [URL=http://imageshack.us]ImageShack.us[/URL]
.::Videos::.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ckJXEfdPEUg]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ckJXEfdPEUg[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V1M5j8sigQQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V1M5j8sigQQ[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CCgbo-wWG1g]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CCgbo-wWG1g[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXxcWOCDJRQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oXxcWOCDJRQ[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6gCWxP079_8]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6gCWxP079_8[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pho3M34da_M]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Pho3M34da_M[/url]
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CwoV65ABxm4]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CwoV65ABxm4[/url]
Well, That's about it. I'm still hoping to get my server back up to the way it was before. It really is an awesome server and I recommend using for your source if you are a beginner or experienced. I do not recommend using if you are planning on not doing any coding to the source yourself, which is called leeching. I will remove the source if I see that people are leeching it. That means if you use source without commenting or if I just see some server that is obviously using this source.
-Source Link: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?th16j5v5juppdbs[/url]
IF YOU FIND THIS SOURCE ANYWHERE ELSE, PLEASE TELL ME. I DID NOT TAKE IT FROM ANYONE. I WILL DEAL WITH THEM IF YOU FIND IT ANYWHERE ELSE. I AM THE OWNER OF THIS SOURCE.
-Austin/Frogs482/Slimy Rock, Owner of BoneScape 508

item.title: BoneScape 508 Source - Pking/Spawning Server - Updated
item.dc:creator: @smud_pk_mods smud pk mods
item.description:
@smud_pk_mods wrote:

[quote=“pj3r b4rr4q3, post:108, topic:341182”]is there no owner rank? just hidden admin-owner, most of commands in source in commands.java doesnt work, and there is no d claws added… just runeclaws with spec, and the pictures shows pvp armour and i cant find code for pvp arm on this source

owner of server pls answer on my questions… is there really no pvp armour? only vls? [/quote]
Do you know what a client is? The client I used had all that stuff on it
And the reason there is no owner rights is so people can’t do what you’re trying to do lol
In commands.java you can specify the owner’s username so that nobody can be an owner unless they have some insane cheat client or they access the files

Read full topic
